content.title: Add Code to the Controller
content.body:
1. Download the code that implements the NFI from here.
  2. Open the downloaded file and copy its contents.
  3. From the Project explorer, navigate to Mobile > Controllers.
  4. Select deviceSettingsController.
    The file opens in edit mode on the canvas.
  5. Enter the copied code in deviceSettingsController.
  6. From the main menu, navigate to Project and select Save All.
